articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Chol Bong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Chol Bong
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of Ri Chol Bong, chief secretary of the Kangwon Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who is member of the WPK Central Committee and a deputy to the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Saturday, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Obituary of Ri Chol Bong Issued
articles.content:
Obituary of Ri Chol Bong Issued
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Ri Chol Bong, chief secretary of the Kangwon Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, member of the WPK Central Committee and deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, died in a traffic accident at the age of 78 on December 25. 
					 An obituary of Ri Chol Bong was issued in the joint name of the WPK Central Committee and the Presidium of the SPA of the DPRK on Friday.
					
					 According to it, Ri Chol Bong was a faithful revolutionary soldier of the WPK who dedicated himself to the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche true to the leadership of the party and the leader.
					
					 Born in a revolutionary's family during the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule, he grew up under its revolutionary influence. After the liberation of the country he grew to be an able official under the care of President Kim Il Sung and devotedly worked for the development of the WPK and the revolutionary armed forces and the prosperity of the socialist homeland.
					
					 During the Fatherland Liberation War he bravely fought with arms in hand. He contributed to increasing the combat capability of the revolutionary armed forces, working at an important post of the Korean People's Army during socialist construction.
					
					 In the period when a dynamic drive was under way for modeling the whole society on the Juche idea he devoted all his wisdom and enthusiasm to the victory in the great campaign for socialist construction, holding important posts in the fields of transport, city administration and building materials industry.
					
					 He held the posts of minister and director of the political bureau of the people's security organ, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee, minister of City Administration and director of the Political Bureau of the Ministry of Railways from early in the 1980s. In recent years he worked as chief secretary of the Kangwon Provincial Committee of the WPK.
					
					 He worked as an official of the leading organ of the WPK Central Committee and a deputy to the SPA for years. He was awarded Order of Kim Il Sung and many other state commendations for his exploits performed for the country and the revolution.
					
					 Thoroughly armed with the Juche idea, Songun idea of the WPK, he remained intensely loyal to the leadership of the party to the last moments of his life.

articles.title: Gift from Russian Igor Moiseyev Dance Company
articles.content:
Gift from Russian Igor Moiseyev Dance Company
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Russian State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 99 (2010).
					 It was handed to the DPRK ambassador to Russia on Dec. 22 by Elena Scherbakova, director of the company.

articles.title: KCNA Report on Kim Jong Il's Field Guidance This year
articles.content:
KCNA Report on Kim Jong Il's Field Guidance This Year
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il, standing on the forefront of socialist construction in Juche 98 (2009), injected inexhaustible energy into the ranks of the general advance and thus brought about a great turn in the drive to build a rich and powerful nation. The KCNA Saturday published a report on the records of the field guidance provided by him in the year. 
					 According to the report, he provided field guidance to at least 200 units across the country this year.
					
					 The number of the units which received his field guidance in the first three months of the great advance for effecting a great surge that started at the outset of the year is more than quadruple that in the same period of last year. 
					
					 Under his leadership the Songjin Steel Complex witnessed a great event to be specially recorded in the development of metallurgic industry, the event that definitely put the nation's metal industry on the orbit of its development on the basis of Juche iron.
					
					 While giving on-the-spot guidance to the Taehung Youth Mine, he most highly appreciated the feat its workers performed by successfully placing the magnesia clinker production on a Juche basis in the spirit of self-reliance in a brief span of time. This benevolent care resulted in the emergence of the first hero mine in the country.
					
					  The builders of the Huichon Power Station have completed in a matter of five months the amount of work which would take several years at ordinary pace by dashing ahead along the path indicated by him, creating the "Huichon Speed", a great speed of advance in Songun Korea.
					
					 A new era of full introduction of CNC technology has been ushered in economic construction. Keeping pace with the forced march of peerlessly great man Kim Jong Il, the Taean Heavy Machine Complex wrought such a miracle in the spirit of self-reliance as putting super-large machine tools on a CNC basis and the Kusong Machine Tool Factory turned into a model factory equipped with up-to-the-minute technology.
					
					 He visited the February 8 Vinalon Complex twice to give field guidance to it and also toured the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex, bringing about a great leap forward in the development of the nation's chemical and fertilizer industries.
					
					  While visiting the Samilpho Special Product Factory, he highly praised the factory for setting an example in producing varieties of highest quality foodstuffs by totally relying on the locally available raw materials and resources and thus kindled a torch for bringing about a new radical turn in the foodstuff processing industry.
					
					 He provided on-the-spot guidance to the Migok Cooperative Farm in Sariwon City, the Unhung Cooperative Farm in Thaechon County and other rural areas, leading them to thoroughly implement the party's policy on bringing about a radical turn in agriculture. His field guidance kicked off a nationwide hot competition for a leaping boost in agricultural production.
					
					  The Ostrich Farm has turned into a large-scale one presenting spectacular scenery and cattle farms, pig farms, chicken farms and other stock-breeding bases have been technologically updated and fish culture centers have been equipped with the latest science and technology thanks to his loving care for providing the people with most affluent and highly civilized life.
					
					 The people's ideal was translated into a reality wherever he went as exemplified by the construction of attractive mountaineering roads on Mt. Myohyang presenting superb scenery, the renovation of the Pyongyang Grand Theatre, the appearance of Majon Hotel, the Kalma Theatre, the North Hwanghae Provincial Art Theatre and other best centres for cultural and emotional life, the Taedonggang Tile Factory, the world's best general building material base, Mansudae Street, a standard for building apartment houses of a thriving nation, the Hwangjin Hot Spring Village, a socialist fairyland, and other places.
					
					 He energetically led the work to put science, education, culture and arts and land construction onto the highest level.
					
					 The whole party's campaign for general offensive, the all-state campaign for general mobilization and the all-people life-and-death campaign were conducted to bring about an epochal phase in building a thriving nation, inspired by the indefatigable journeys for field guidance made by him and the 150-day campaign and the 100-day campaign resulted in bringing a shining heyday to Songun Korea.

articles.title: Delegation of Songjin Steel Complex Feted
articles.content:
Delegation of Songjin Steel Complex Feted
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Banquets were given at the Mokran House and the People's Palace of Culture Friday to welcome the delegation of workers and technicians of the Songjin Steel Complex.
					 Present there were senior party, army and state officials, chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the Workers' Party of Korea and leading officials of working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, made a speech at the banquet given at the Mokran House while Premier Kim Yong Il addressed the banquet given at the People's Palace of Culture.
					
					Upon the authorization of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the speakers warmly welcomed the delegation of workers and technicians of the Songjin Steel Complex who completely established the Korean-style system for the production of Juche iron true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung and brought about a leaping advance in the production.
					
					 It is none other than Kim Jong Il who should receive congratulations before anybody else on the success made in creating the Juche-oriented steel production method, they said, referring to the indefatigable efforts made by Kim Jong Il to materialize the behests of the President who said that whoever follows the Juche idea should produce Juche iron.
					
					 They said that today's historic event in which the Korean-style system for the production of Juche iron was completed to put an end to the conventional iron and steel making method would have been unthinkable without the President's idea of producing Juche iron and the undying feats he performed for it and Kim Jong Il's revolutionary faith and will and outstanding leadership.
					
					 They called on the workers of the complex to live up to Kim Jong Il's deep trust and great expectation with loyalty, cherishing deep in their minds the high honor and happiness bestowed upon them by him.

articles.title: Anniversary of Buddhist Federation of Korea Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Buddhist Federation of Korea Marked
						
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place here on Saturday to mark the 64th anniversary of the founding of the Buddhist Federation of Korea. 
					 Present there were office bearers of the Central Committee of the federation and its provincial, city and county committees and chief priests of temples in different parts of the country and monks and Buddhists in Pyongyang. 
					
					 Sim Sang Jin, chairman of the Central Committee of the federation who is most venerable, made a report. 
					
					He reviewed the path covered by the federation over the last 64 years, fully enjoying the freedom of a religious life under the care of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il since its founding. He referred to the achievements made in the cooperation and exchanges between the Buddhists of the north and the south for building a thriving nation and implementing the June 15 joint declaration and in the involvement in the actions for national reunification.
					
					 He called upon all the Buddhists to make a tangible contribution to the efforts for opening the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 true to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il. He also underlined the need for them to achieve Dharma-minded concord and energetically turn out in the actions against the treacherous and anti-reunification acts of the south Korean authorities and ultra-right conservative forces that pushed the inter-Korean relations to catastrophe though they had favorably developed.

articles.title: Models of Historic Remains, Relics Made for Exhibition
articles.content:
Models of Historic Remains, Relics Made for Exhibition
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Fine art institutions of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have made imitations of historic remains and relics to be exhibited at Pyongyang Folk Park, which is now under construction at the foot of picturesque Mt. Taesong.
					 The imitations represent typical historic remains and relics belonging to the period from Ancient Korea (early 30th century B.C.-108 B.C.) to Ri Dynasty (1392-1910).
					
					 Among them are those of Buddhist images, mural paintings and Buddhist donation boxes and wood blocks belonging to the period of Koguryo (277 B.C.-668 A.D.)
					
					 Typical of the images are the Pulguk Temple's two gilt-bronze ones characterized by a high molding skill, well-molded balanced figure and polished representation.
					
					 A large mural painting representing a procession in King Kogukwon's mausoleum has already been finished and portraits of Tangun, Ko Ju Mong, Wang Kwon and other founders of kingdoms, autographs of An Jung Gun, Kim Ok Gyun, Han Sok Bong, Kim Jong Hui and other historical personages, wall painting "Farm Life" and folding screen "Wild Geese in Moonlight" as well as Buddhist fixtures to be placed in temples in the park are near completion. 
					
					 The project also includes some 1,000 pieces of brassware, daggers including pipha-shaped ones, Angbu Ilgu (sundial) and iron-made rain gauge which were made in Korea in the first half of the 15th century, monument to the great victory in a battle in a northern area of Korea and monument to the great victory in a battle in Yonsong (fort in Yonan).

articles.title: Signal Successes Made by Sportspersons
articles.content:
Signal Successes Made by Sportspersons
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Sportspersons of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have proved successful at international tournaments in the year of Juche 98 (2009).
					 The DPRK team earned a ticket for the 2010 FIFA World Cup in last June, demonstrating the ever-growing might of the Korean footballers and delighting all the people of the country.
					
					 For the excellent result beyond expectations of football experts and fans all over the world, the Asian Football Confederation conferred the prize of the best football association (for men) to the Korean Football Association in the annual awarding ceremony held some time ago.
					
					 In wrestling, gymnastic, judo, weightlifting and other international tournaments, many DPRK athletes have won gold medals.
					
					 Yang Kyong Il placed the first at the 55kg freestyle wrestling category of the 2009 World Wrestling Championship held in Denmark.
					
					 Hong Un Jong and Pak Hyon Suk, Olympic gold medalists, won the women's vaulting horse event at the 25th Universiad and the women's 63kg weightlifting category at the 5th East Asian Games respectively.
					
					 Rim Yun Hui came first at the women's 57kg category of the 2009 Asian Judo Championship to win the prize for the best player and Kim Kuk Hyang bagged three gold medals in the women's above 69 kg category of the 1st World Juvenile Weightlifting Championships. Ko Hyon Suk garnered two gold, one silver and one bronze medals at the 3rd "Challenger Cup" International Speed Skating Tournament.
					
					 Taekwon-Do players who had distinguished themselves in international Taekwon-Do games displaying the wisdom and spirit of the Korean nation won three trophies, 19 gold medals, two silver medals and three bronze medals, thus coming first in the team standings at the 16th World Taekwon-Do Championships.
					
					 Similar successes have been gained at the Artistic Gymnastics World Cup, 2009 Asian Wrestling Championships, 1st Asian Youth Games and other international games, fully displaying the dignity of the Kim Il Sung nation and the might of Songun Korea.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday praises General Secretary Kim Jong Il for the immortal feats he has performed by making a great history of revolutionary morality in a signed article dedicated to the 14th anniversary of the publication of his work "Respecting the Forerunners of the Revolution Is a Noble Moral Obligation of Revolutionaries".
					 The work, published on December 25, Juche 84 (1995), clarifies the importance of having a correct viewpoint and attitude towards the revolutionary forerunners in carrying out the cause of socialism and the principled issues arising in developing the noble relations of moral obligation among the people.
					
					 The article says that the above-said immortal exploits lie in that Kim Jong Il successfully accomplished the cause of perpetuating the memory of the leader, the supreme representative of revolutionary forerunners, strengthened the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks in the DPRK in every way on the basis of the noble sense of moral obligation and made sure that all the people eternally glorified the tradition of the advance for effecting a great surge, a legacy of the preceding generation of the revolution.
					
					 It notes that Kim Jong Il has wisely led the army and people of the DPRK to create a speed of the great advance for effecting a great surge in the drive for achieving the prosperity of the country and bring about a great leap forward and innovations in building a thriving nation by carrying forward the tradition of struggle established by the revolutionary forerunners.
					
					 It calls on all the party members and other working people to dynamically struggle, united closer around Kim Jong Il in thinking and purpose and in the sense of moral obligation, and thus emerge honorable victors in the on-going advance for effecting a great surge.

articles.title: S. Korean Forces' Moves to Railroad Evil Laws Censured
articles.content:
S. Korean Forces' Moves to Railroad Evil Laws Censured
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Various civic and public organizations of south Korea including the All-people Measure Committee for Checking the Project for Destroying Four Large Rivers and Protecting Life-Giving Rivers, the Railway Workers' Union and the Joint Conference of Civic and Public Organizations against the Renewed Troop Dispatch to Afghanistan held a rally in Seoul on Dec. 23 at which they denounced the conservative ruling forces for trying to railroad the unpopular and anti-peace evil laws through the "National Assembly".
					 The speakers at the rally accused the "government" and the "Grand National Party" of seeking to ram a "draft budget for improvement of four large rivers", a "draft amendment to the law on trade unions" and a "motion calling for renewed troop dispatch to Afghanistan", etc. through the NA despite the unanimous warning of the people.
					
					 The present "government's" misrule has reached its height, they deplored, declaring that the people will never pardon the crimes the present conservative rulers committed by causing the Ryongsan tragedy and suppressing trade unions, etc.
					
					 The participants urged the puppet authorities to immediately stop the moves to enact evil laws.

articles.title: Improved Inter-Korean Relations Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Improved Inter-Korean Relations Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a press conference in Seoul on Wednesday urging the puppet authorities to opt for improving the inter-Korean relations.
					 The organization denounced the present authorities for persisting in their moves against the nation and reunification such as threatening the democratization of society and the right of the people to existence, disregarding the will of the people desirous of national reconciliation, unity and co-prosperity. 
					
					 The independent and peaceful reunification is the desire of all the members of the Korean nation and their task, it said, urging the present "government" to roll back its hostile policy toward the north and opt for improving the south-north relations, though belatedly.
					
					 The organization vowed to put on a more popular basis the reunification movement in 2010, the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: Dismantlement of Concrete Wall Demanded
articles.content:
Dismantlement of Concrete Wall Demanded
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The Czech, Moravian, Silesian Trade Unions' Association issued a statement on Dec. 21 on the lapse of 30 years since the concrete wall was built.
					 Saying that the wall built by the south Korean authorities is a product of confrontation on the Korean Peninsula, the statement went on:
					
					 The DPRK has long made efforts to get the wall pulled down and ensure free visits between the north and the south of Korea. 
					
					 The wall is a product of the moves of the U.S. and the south Korean rulers to keep Korea divided into two parts indefinitely, the statement noted, adding that it is impossible to expect the peaceful reunification of Korea and the cooperation between the north and the south unless it is pulled down.
					
					 If the U.S. and the south Korean authorities truly wish for the peace, reconciliation and cooperation on the peninsula, they should remove this huge concrete wall before anything else.
					
					 The statement expressed full support to the efforts of the DPRK to achieve the peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: DPRK Important Day Observed
articles.content:
DPRK Important Day Observed
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in Russia, Cuba and Bulgaria and a seminar and film show took place in Bangladesh from Dec. 18 to 22 on the occasions of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 92nd birth anniversary of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 Vorontsov, first vice-chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, said in a speech that the DPRK has traversed the road of victory, resolutely foiling all the moves of the U.S. and its followers to stifle the DPRK as it held Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 Veredin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, noted that thanks to the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il the DPRK is standing as a fortress of peace and its position is rising in the international arena as the days go by.
					
					 Juan Jose Leon Vega, first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, referred to the revolutionary life of Kim Jong Suk, noting that she is the great mother who brought up Kim Jong Il as the future of Korea. 
					
					 Jasim Udinh Ahmed, advisor to the Institute for the Study of Juche Idea of Bangladesh, and other speakers said that the DPRK's independent politics based on the Juche idea is the politics most firmly protecting and guaranteeing the sovereignty and dignity of the country and nation. 
					
					 Kim Jong Suk made a great contribution to accomplishing the cause of liberating the country, they added.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting held in Russia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente de entidad rusa
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente de entidad rusa
  Pyongyang, 26 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio presente que le dirigiera el Conjunto de Danza Folclorica Academica Nacional Igori Moiseyev de Rusia con motivo del Ano Nuevo 99 (2010) de la Era Juche.
					  La directora del citado conjunto, Elena Scherbakova, lo entrego el dia 22 al embajador coreano acreditado en Rusia.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun conmemora 14o aniversario de obra de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun conmemora 14o aniversario de obra de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 26 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El periodico Rodong Sinmun divulgo este sabado un articulo individual dedicado al XIV aniversario de la obra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "Tratar con respeto a los precursores de la revolucion es un sublime deber moral de los revolucionarios" publicada el 25 de diciembre del 84 (1995) de la Era Juche, en el cual elogio las inmortales hazanas de el quien dio inicio a la gran historia del establecimiento de la moral revolucionaria.
					  En esa obra estan indicados claramente la importancia de tener correcta concepcion y actitud sobre los precursores de la revolucion en el cumplimiento de la causa socialista y los problemas de principios que se presentan en desarrollar las nobles relaciones de obligacion moral entre las personas, comienza el articulista y prosigue:
					
					  La inmortal hazana del Dirigente reside en que el realizo brillantemente la causa por la eternidad del lider, maximo representante de los precursores de la revolucion, fortalecio por todos los medios la unidad monolitica de las filas revolucionarias de Corea basandose en la noble obligacion moral e hizo que todo el pueblo continuara siempre la tradicion de la marcha del gran auge que le legaron los revolucionarios de la anterior generacion.
					
					Hoy, el Dirigente orienta sabiamente al ejercito y al pueblo de Corea para que ellos registraran grandes saltos e innovaciones en la construccion de una gran potencia prospera creando la velocidad de avance del gran auge, que traera la prosperidad de la patria, al dar continuidad a las tradiciones de lucha hechas por los precursores de la revolucion.
					
					  Todos los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores deben luchar firmemente uniendose mas compactamente en lo ideo-volitivo y en lo moral en torno al Dirigente para tener el honor de triunfador en la marcha de hoy por producir un gran auge.

articles.title: Actividades en varios paises por efemerides coreanas
articles.content:
Actividades en varios paises por efemerides coreanas
 Pyongyang, 26 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 18o aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del 92o aniversario del natalicio de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk tuvieron lugar entre los dias 18 y 22 mitines en Rusia, Cuba y Bulgaria y simposio y proyeccion filmica en Bangladesh.
					El primer vicepresidente de la Asociacion Rusa de Amistad y Cooperacion Cultural con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Vorontsov, en su discurso pronunciado en el mitin, senalo que al tener al Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del EPC, la RPDC pudo recorrer por el unico camino de la victoria frustrando con valentia todas las maquinaciones de aplastamiento de Estados Unidos y sus fuerzas satelites contra ella.
					
					El secretario del CC del Partido Comunista de la Union Sovietica, Veredin, senalo que gracias a la politica de Songun del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Corea  sirve del baluarte de la paz y su posicion se eleva cada dia mas en la escala internacional.
					
					El primer vicepresidente del Comite Cubano de Apoyo a la Reunificacion de Corea, Juan Jose Leon Vega, se refirio a la vida revolucionaria de la Heroina Kim Jong Suk diciendo que ella es la gran madre quien crio a su hijo como futuro dirigente de Corea.
					
					   El asesor del Instituto de la Idea Juche de Bangladesh, Jasim Udinh Ahmed y otros oradores elogiaron altamente que la politica independiente de Corea que materializa la idea Juche es la que defiende mas estrictamente la soberania y la dignidad del pais y la nacion.
					
					Subrayaron que la Heroina hizo un gran aporte a lograr la causa de la liberacion de la patria.
					
					En el mitin efectuado en Rusia fue aprobado un mensaje de felicitacion al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Exitos de este ano en rama deportiva
articles.content:
Exitos de este ano en rama deportiva
Pyongyang, 26 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Este ano, los deportistas coreanos alcanzaron en las competencias internacionales orgullosos exitos que admiran a todo el mundo. 
					  En junio pasado, los futbolistas ganaron el boleto a la Copa Mundial de la FIFA de 2010 volviendo a mostrar el poderio del futbol coreano en constante desarrollo y llenando a todo el pais de gran jubilo. 
					
					Por este exito sorprendente que dio vuelco a los pronosticos de muchos especialistas y aficionados al futbol del mundo, la Asociacion de Futbol de Corea recibio en la reciente premiacion anual de la Confederacion Asiatica de Futbol el premio que se otorga a la mejor asociacion en la categoria masculina.
					
					  Emergieron muchos ganadores de las medallas de oro en varias disciplinas como lucha, gimnasia, judo y levantamiento de pesas.
					
					  Yang Kyong Il glorifico a la patria al ocupar el primer lugar en la lucha libre de la division de 55 kilos del Campeonato Mundial de Lucha de 2009 realizado en Dinamarca. 
					
					  Las campeonas olimpicas Hong Un Jong y Pak Hyon Suk subieron a lo mas alto del podio en el potro de la gimnasia femenina de la XXV Universiada y en la division de 63 kilos del levantamiento de pesas (f) de los V Juegos de Asia Oriental, respectivamente. 
					
					  Ademas, Rim Yun Hui ocupo el primer lugar en la division de 57 kilos (f) del Campeonato Asiatico de Judo de 2009 y recibio el premio que se otorga a la mejor jugadora. 
					
					  Kim Kuk Hyang gano 3 medallas de oro en la categoria de mas de 69 kilos (f) en el primer Campeonato Mundial de Juniores de Levantamiento de Pesas.
					
					  En el III Torneo Internacional de Patinaje de Velocidad por la Copa de Retadores Ko Hyon Suk conquisto 2 medallas de oro, 1 de plata y 1 de bronce. 
					
					  Los taekwondoistas, que vinieron mostrando en los anteriores juegos internacionales la inteligencia y el impetu de la nacion coreana, encabezaron la clasificacion general por paises del 16o Campeonato Mundial de Taekwondo con 3 copas, 19 preseas de oro, 2 de plata y 3 de bronce.
					
					  Los jugadores, que compitieron en la Copa Mundial de Gimnasia, la Competencia Asiatica de Lucha de 2009, el 21o Campeonato Asiatico de Levantamiento de Pesas (F), la I Competencia Asiatica de Juniores, la Competencia Internacional de Patinaje de Velocidad en la Pista Corta por la Copa Danubia y otros eventos, tambien alcanzaron exitos relevantes manifestando a todo el mundo la dignidad de la nacion de Kim Il Sung y el gallardo aspecto de la Corea del Songun.
